About Me

I am a Full-Stack developer, interesting in web app development, optimization, performance, I have good knowledge with javascript language and other web technology like React&Redux, I have a motivation to learn new things and do things, It has a positive return on my career.

Front-end Development Skills

I have good knowledge with basic web languages (HTML, CSS, JS) and React Library, some other UI frameworks and Libraries like Bootstrap4 and Material UI, React Bootstrap and few more.

Back-end Development Siklls

I have good knowledge with NodeJS run-time environment, and Express framework, Python&flask, MongoDB&mongoose and I had to work with SQL databases like PostgresSQL and MySQL.
